sourcesContent:
{{ item.product.title }}

{{ item.product.description }}

Quantity: {{ item.quantity }}

Size: {{ item.size }}

import { Component, OnInit } from '@angular/core'; import { CartService } from '../service/cart.service'; import { Product } from '../models/product.model'; @Component({ selector: 'app-cart', templateUrl: './cart.component.html', styleUrls: ['./cart.component.scss'] }) export class CartComponent implements OnInit { cartItems: { product: Product; size: string | null; quantity: number }[] = []; constructor(private cartService: CartService) { } ngOnInit(): void { this.cartItems = this.cartService.getCart(); } }
